com.sun.enterprise.deployment.annotation.context

Class EjbBundleContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glassfish.apf.context.AnnotationContext
      • com.sun.enterprise.deployment.annotation.context.ResourceContainerContextImpl
        • com.sun.enterprise.deployment.annotation.context.EjbBundleContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentContext, HandlerContext, ResourceContainerContext, ServiceReferenceContainerContext, AnnotatedElementHandler

    public class EjbBundleContext
extends ResourceContainerContextImpl
    This ClientContext implementation holds a top level reference to the DOL EJB BundleDescriptor which will be used to populate any information processed from the annotations.
    Author:
    Jerome Dochez
